name: Goo!iem
description:
WolfByte Games proudly presents:

After being captured and imprisoned in a mysterious technological complex inside a cavernous system, the elemental creatures known as "Slieeme" awaken to the call of their planet and begin to find ways to escape from this place. These creatures wake up in elemental bodies and then can change the state of their bodies. They must use all the intelligence, powers, and resources they possess to escape their terrible bondage.
